faq.name: Where is Olanka Travels located ?
faq.description: Olanka Travels is located in Sri Lanka, at 87 Dutugemunu St, Dehiwala-Mount Lavinia.

faq.name: What are the countries to which I can Fly with Olanka travels?
faq.description: You can fly to Sri Lanka, Maldives, Vietnam, Indonesia, Cambodia , Singapore and UAE with Olanka.

faq.name: How do I book a tour with Olanka?
faq.description:
*Give the Requirement to Olanka                    
*Few Tour Options will be emailed to You                  
*Request for any Changes or If not proceed with the Payment           	
*Make a Reservation for Air, Hotels, Transport, Sightseeing, Guides,Etc..            
*Within 72 Hours, Return Back to You with all Confirmation       	
*Process Visa                  
Enjoy your tour with Olanka

faq.name: What are the general timings look like, when I book with Olanka?
faq.description: You can start the enquiry by Filling the web form, Web live, Chat, Email or  Call us. Within 5 minutes a Travel Expert will connect with you to discuss your requirement and will give Free expert travel advice and within another 30 minutes you will Receive 3 Travel Options. Finally you can Receive Your Trip Confirmation.

faq.name: When will  the reservation be confirmed ?
faq.description:
Your reservation request will be confirmed upon receipt of the full payment due at the time of booking. In these cases you will be notified at the time of booking.

Please be aware that airfares need to be paid in full at the time of booking*

faq.name: How can I contact Olanka travels, If I have questions?
faq.description: We have a 24/7 customer support system. Our customer service isnt time bound. Travel agents at Olanka are always ready to serve you at anytime.

faq.name: What services can I book with Olanka ?
faq.description: You can book tours, accommodation & air tickets with us.

faq.name: Do I need travel insurance?
faq.description: Adequate insurance is mandatory for all clients to cover at least but not limited to medical and repatriation expenses, loss of luggage, cancellation or curtailment of a Product and should not exclude any planned adventure activities from the time of booking for the full duration of the Product as a minimum.

faq.name: What type of clothes should I pack?
faq.description: Lightweight, light coloured cotton clothes are ideal for the warm climes of a tropical country. Wed like to recommend that you pack some warm clothes if you are planning to visit the hilly regions, where the evenings tend to get chilly. Better to decide with your destinations

faq.name: Should I pay for taking photographs of people or places?
faq.description: Tourists are sometimes asked to pay for taking photos. Always ask before you photograph whether payment is expected. Our accompanying representatives will be able to guide you on this.

faq.name: Where can I read previous reviews & customer success stories?
faq.description: You can read those from our website , google reviews, tripadvisor and Facebook.

faq.name: Can I make a complaint to Olanka if something goes wrong?
faq.description: Yes, In the event the Client has a complaint about any of the product arrangements the client must raise the complaint immediately with Olanka Travel employee. so Olanka Travel can use its best endeavors to rectify the problem.

faq.name: How will I receive confirmation of my booking?
faq.description: you will receive the  written confirmation from Olanka travels.

faq.name: Can I read the terms and conditions before making a reservation?
faq.description: Yes, you can read the terms and conditions on Olanka Travels website.

faq.name: What are the different product options I have?
faq.description: We have 4 options, namely Tailor made tours, Small group tours, Fixed tours and Special package tours.

faq.name: What are the payment methods Olanka accepts?
faq.description:
You can make a "secure" payment online to Olanka Travels using any of the below credit card, debit card ,wallets or  Global Bank Accounts

Olanka accepts International Payment Systems such as Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal, WeChat, Alipay, PayTM. And Credit & Debit Cards such as  Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Union Pay, Donarclub.Bank Transfers to our Global Bank Accounts around the world in multiple currencies

faq.name: How much in  advance do I need to pay to  book a tour with Olanka?
faq.description:
You have to pay 20% in advance to book a trip with Olanka travels.

The balance amount - on arrival 
                                  - link; before 2 days
                                  - if it is bank payment ; before starting the tour.

faq.name: Do I have to pay for travel consultations?
faq.description: No, you dont need to pay anything separately.

faq.name: Do I need to pay to get a quote?
faq.description: No, you dont need to pay for  our holiday planning services

faq.name: Can I cancel my trip ?
faq.description: Yes, If clients wishing to cancel must inform Olanka Travels in writing signed by the lead passenger on the booking form. Cancellation will take effect on the date the cancellation request is received by Olanka Travels

faq.name: What is the cancellation policy of Olanka travels?
faq.description:
In case of cancellation , the following cancellation charges will be applicable.

*Cancellations made prior 30 days from the scheduled start of a tour , 80% of total fee will be refunded.
*Cancellation made with less than 30 days from the start of a tour - zero refund

faq.name: What could be the issue if I tried to pay for my trip but was unsuccessful?
faq.description: Insufficient funds, inaccurate payment information, or problems with the internet connection can all prevent online payments through our booking engine from being processed. After looking over everything above, if your payment is still not processing, contact us.

faq.name: What is the refund policy for the Olanka travel gift voucher?
faq.description:
Customers can redeem their Gift voucher against any of the holiday packages offered. The amount of the gift card can be used for multiple bookings on the condition that all bookings are done on the same day.
Any unredeemed gift voucher or pending balance on the gift voucher will be refunded, upon request, after a cancellation/refund fee of LKR *****.

faq.name: Is travel insurance included in the travel package?
faq.description: No, Clients are fully responsible for arranging their own travel insurance.

faq.name: What is included in the tour package price?
faq.description: Only the products listed are included in the price of any vacation that is booked.

faq.name: What are other expenses that I can expect beyond the travel package?
faq.description: Personal expenses, such as personal insurance, refreshments, phone calls, laundry, gifts, meals, and beverages (unless otherwise specified), optional excursions, passport and visa fees, porterage, gratuities, or taxes, shall in every instance be the client's responsibility.

faq.name: Do I need a visa to arrive in Sri Lanka?
faq.description: Yes, you need a visa to arrive in Sri Lanka. Apart from that, if youre planning a short visit to Sri Lanka, youre required to obtain Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) before your arrival

faq.name: what is the best time to visit Sri Lanka?
faq.description: Sri Lanka is a tropical country with magnificent weather. You can enjoy the island at any time of the year.

faq.name: What are the visit attractions in Sri Lanka?
faq.description: There are several highly religious sites for the religious devotee, and unbelievable historical tourist attractions for history buffs in Sri Lanka

faq.name: Which Language(s) will people understand / communicate?
faq.description: While Sinhala and Tamil are the official & most widely spoken languages in the country, English is a link language which is generally understood by most people. English is spoken at all hotels, major restaurants and shops. Road signs are mostly written both in Sinhalese & English.

faq.name: What currency is used in Sri Lanka?
faq.description: To pay while you're in Sri Lanka, you'll need to use Sri Lankan rupee banknotes.

faq.name: Where can I exchange money?
faq.description: This can be done in the airport and outside the airport there are banks and authorized money exchangers. Highly advisable to go for a commercial bank.

faq.name: Are credit card charges made in foreign currency?
faq.description: No, they arent. Due to exchange regulations in the country, local establishments will determine your payments by applying the exchange rate prevailing at the date of payment.

faq.name: How much money can I take out of the country?
faq.description: If you intend to take out from Sri Lanka a sum exceeding US $5000(or its equivalent in Euro or some other currency) in currency notes (out of the money brought in), you must declare the total amount brought in, even if its less than US$ 15,000.

faq.name: What type of accommodation can I expect?
faq.description: We offer a wide range of accommodation from private boutique hotels, villas, eco lodges and tents. But, some of our nature & adventure trips involve traveling to remote or undeveloped outstation destinations where hotel accommodation of International tourist standard may not exist & facilities are relatively poor.

faq.name: What is Srilankan cuisine?
faq.description: Sri Lankan Cuisine is known for its unique combinations of herbs and spices which gives it a unique flavor of its own. This cuisine is mainly based on rice and coconut as both of these are easily available in the island

faq.name: Are there any options for vegetarians?
faq.description: Sri Lanka has a variety of foods  for vegetarians. You can travel all over the country and never worry about having something delicious to eat

faq.name: Can I get Halal food?
faq.description: Halal food isnt very common in major hotels. The Galadari and Holiday Inn in Colombo serve halal food as does the Confifi group of hotels (Eden, Riverina & Club Palm Garden). Apart from the Halal restaurants in Colombo and Kandy, theyre hardly anywhere else. The best alternative seems to be seafood.

faq.name: What is the traditional food of Sri Lanka?
faq.description: The central feature of Sri Lankan cuisine is boiled or steamed rice, served with a curry of fish or meat, along with other curries made with vegetables, lentils, or fruits. Dishes are accompanied by pickled fruits or vegetables, chutneys, and sambols.

faq.name: Is Sri Lanka a safe destination for tourists?
faq.description: Sri Lanka is completely safe to travel, The country is at peace. Tourists visit Sri Lanka in record numbers and feel the pervading sense of peace, safety and stability as they relish the pristine glory of the small island nation. Where we conduct our tours, we also ensure the safety and security of our tourists.

faq.name: How should I be dressed if I visit a Buddhist or Hindu Temple?
faq.description: You should take off your shoes and hat when entering a Buddhist or Hindu temple. If youre carrying an umbrella, unfurl it. Your legs & shoulders should be covered; never enter a temple in beach wear (i.e. shorts or singlet).

faq.name: What type of plugs can I use?
faq.description: Sri Lankan hotels have two types of plug bases; either the UK (Type G) or India (Type D). *Do not confuse it with the larger 15 Amp plug which is used for heavy duty appliances like air-conditioners, and microwave ovens.

faq.name: What health issues must I be concerned with?
faq.description: Sri Lanka boasts one of the most reliable healthcare systems in the developing world. But emergency medical facilities may not be widely available outside of the main cities. Those traveling from Africa or Latin America must have a valid certificate of vaccination for Yellow fever and Meningitis before the arrival.

faq.name: Necesito un visado para llegar a Sri Lanka?
faq.description: S, necesitas un visado para llegar a Sri Lanka. Adems, si planea una visita corta a Sri Lanka, debe obtener una autorizacin electrnica de viaje (ETA) antes de su llegada

data.summary: Escape to Embudu Village Island Resort in South Male Atoll for homely luxury, classic beachfront villas, and overwater accommodations amid lush surroundings. A short boat ride from Velana International Airport, the resort offers stunning sunsets, world-class dive sites, and diverse activities.

The nearby reef is full of colorful sea life, and the deeper waters promise amazing sights to explore.

data.title: Family Tour to Sri Lanka
data.author: Rob Aivatoglou
data.content:
I contacted Olanka online about our planned family trip to Sri Lanka. Thamashiya did a great job pulling together an itinerary that ensured we visited all the sites we wanted to see. We are a family of 4 with 2 teenage kids. Our driver was Ali and he was fantastic. Excellent spoken English and a very safe driver! Nothing was too difficult and he always accommodated our wants and needs. He took time to explain things, ,provide us with our options and then help us make decisions. We also had Huzni the photographer from Olanka on our trip which really added to the experience. He was also very knowledgeable and had excellent English too. Ali and Huzni joined us for many meals, and were both excellent company. We were quite active and did a number of hikes - some sunrise, some sunset, visited a number of national parks, ate at many local restaurants, and generally really enjoyed the culture, food and people. By choice, we caught a number of local trains between some centres. Olanka, Thamashiya, driver Ali and chief photographer Huzni all added to our experience and ensured everything was seamless. Highly recommend them. Thanks guys! 
Rob, Oni, George & Peg

data.title: Family Trip to Sri Lanka
data.author: Eduardo
data.content:
Dear Ravi and Fernando, 
I hope you are doing well and also I hope you remember our travelling family. This time I'm contacting you with my friend Alfredo, who is planning a trip to Sir Lanka, more or less the same round we did that time, but you can give him different option. I told him that we had a nice experience with your service. So, we felt like we had your attention all to ourselves during our visit to Sri Lanka. You had arranged our tour and catered to all our needs as well as developed a personalized tour with our own guides and driver, which was a privilege that we will not forget. Each aspect of the trip was truely lovely. The driver, was prompt, if not early, courteous, and professional. The hotels were perfect in terms of either location, amenities, and/or unique structures. However, the most unique part of the trip was having access to educated and well versed guides. To learn the history throughout our trip and to evaluate paintings, sculptures, artwork in temples and understand the meaning provided so much substance to our trip. As family travelers, you constantly contacted us during our trip to ensure we were ok.
Best Regards,
Eduardo.

data.title: Amazing Family Trip to Wonder of Asia, Sri Lanka
data.author: Steve Smith
data.content: No words to express how much we got excited with such an amazing experience given by Olanka Travels. We had a superb and fantastic experience in Sri Lanka! This was our first visit and we hope to come again soon. The promptness of our tour consultant, Ann was truly passionate to witness and the way she designed our tour program was unbelievable. Everything was perfect, including driver, the hotels and the places were able to visit. The hotels they have selected for us also have got no escalations and our driver was also a very friendly and punctual. The staff at Olanka Tourism continued to provide information and follow up with us before, during and after our stay. So, the most significant thing is that Olanka Travels was always in constant touch with us to make sure that we are on the tour safely and comfortably off. The lovely souvenir they gifted us at the end of tour was also unforgettable and we cherished every single moment of our tour while thanking to Olanka Travels. Thank you for a wonderful time in your beautiful country and hope to see you again and again in this lovely paradise with Olanka Travels!

data.title: Cricket Tour of Sri Lanka July 2019
data.author: Yusuf
data.content:
We have booked our cricket tour with Olanka 2019 july (this month). Olanka travel guys were wonderful. Very helpful with our tour group. We were travelling with under 16 school cricket team with parents from Wellington NZ. They were very helpful especially Pabasara and Randima and whole Olanka team.
The bus service was amazing and the driver was awesome. Kept us safe all the way through. Always on time for us and very obliging and understanding our needs. We could not have done this trip without our Driver. He was very competent in his driving, very easy to get along with and we benefitted greatly from his experience as he was able to advise us on the best time to set off etc. and otherwise tell us what we needed when going to a particular location. He has excellent English and really made our trip possible through his knowledge and experience. He also helped without having to be asked when we needed assistance. After such a long journey with Pabasara and driver, I think it more accurate to get both of them as friends. Thank you so much both of you for making our cricket tour a success. Wish Olanka travels all the best and looking forward to working with them again in future. Regards...

data.title: Honeymoon Tour to Maldives
data.author: Aamir
data.content:
Thank you so much Olanka Travels for the great experience that you arranged from the start to end. Myself and husband had been to Maldives for our honeymoon. We just had finished off our honeymoon vacation with Olanka. We both were very impressed with the courteous and professional approach of the representatives. All our queries were patiently responded to. The actual trip was also well planned. We did not face any issues whatsoever.

Everything was well organized and planned by our tour consultant Malki. She was very prompt in gathering all our requirements and she was very professional. We had a long discussion and she has answered all my questions with very useful advises as she knew the place. I would strongly recommend her to anyone who is planning to visit Sri Lanka.

The best part is that they had the courtesy checking upon us even after we landed in Maldives. Amazing!

The hotels they suggested us was awesome. They were clean and comfortable with lots of amazing sceneries. We had a great time as well as the food menu was excellent. Thank you team Olanka for a perfectly planned vacation. Will definitely get in touch with you for future holidays and a big thank you for making our lovely honeymoon with full of glamour and elegance!

data.title: Honeymoon Tour to Sri Lanka
data.author: Barry Hickey
data.content:
Myself and my finace recently returned from a trip to Sri Lanka that was organised by Olanka Travels. We had a wonderful trip starting in Negombo and finishing in Bentota. Our agent Salini was incredibly helpful and quick with responses to any queries that we had. As my partner is a wheelchair user we asked that the tour cater for this need insofar as is possible. Salini put together a trip that covered landmarks and experiences such as the Yalla National Park, a visit to the beautiful town Ella and a trip to a sea turtle hatchery, with many more locations besides. Both Salini and Dilan (our Driver) have excellent English which meant that there were no communication issues what so ever.
We could not have done this trip without our Driver, Dilan. He was very competent in his driving, very easy to get along with and we benefitted greatly from his experience as he was able to advise us on the best times to set off etc. and otherwise tell us what we needed when going to a particular location. He has excellent English and really made our trip possible through his knowledge and experience. He also helped without having to be asked when we needed assistance with the wheelchair such as flights of stairs/steps etc. After 10 days in his company I think it more accurate to can him a friend than a driver. Thank you Dilan. We felt very safe throughout our time in Sri Lanka and would encourage those that are considering a trip to Sri Lanka to go ahead and book it. It is a beautiful place with a lovely people and the local economy benefits from every visitor that they get.

data.title: Dubai Fixed Offer Holiday
data.summary: This 3-day tour package will cover the sacred city of Kandy and the bustling city of Colombo. With numerous historical influences and cultural significance, Kandys focal point is the Temple of Tooth, Dalada Maligawa that preserves the tooth relic of Lord Buddha. Tourists booking this package will also get to visit the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage, which is located in Kegalle.
data.conditions:
Booking Information

Upon submission of your booking details, we will proceed with the booking process. At this stage, a 20% deposit is required. A booking confirmation will be sent to you within 48 hours of payment receipt. The remaining 80% of the payment is due 30 days prior to the commencement of the tour. Subsequently, you may proceed with the visa application process.

data.summary: This is the capital city of Vietnam and it was once served as the headquarters of the North Vietnamese communist army. At present it gives a beautiful and educational window into this beautiful country. The city is rich with an elegant blend of Asian Pagodas, communist block buildings and French Colonial relics; and a host of fun and unique attractions in Hanoi for the adventurous travelers.

data.title: Tour Package 04 Days - Taste of Saigon
data.summary: Overnight in Saigon. Saigon is one of the the busiest commercial center in Vietnam.

days.description: Welcome to Saigon. Pick up and transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight in Saigon. Saigon is also known as Ho Chi Minh City is filled with tree-filled wonder, Holidaymakers always stop here in order to admire the mini bridge and Buddhist-style temple.

tour_activities.name: Our Guide Meets you at Noi Bai Airport

days.description: Breakfast at hotel, transfer to Cu Chi Tunnels, central to war strategic operations like 1968 Tet Offensive. Visit man-traps, bomb craters, Independent Palace, Post Office, Notre Dame Catheral, and overnight in Saigon. Start the day with a lesson on guerilla warfare in Vietnam and uncover the mysteries of the Cu Chi tunnels.

tour_activities.name: Half day excursion to Cu Chi Tunnels

days.description: From Saigon, drive through Mekong Delta paddle fields, visit Pineapple Workshop, and explore local craftsmen workshops. Arrive at Thien Ho market and tour the area, stopping at fish farms, rice factories, and plantations.

tour_activities.name: Board a local wooden boat and explore delta
Visit Mekong Town Market and Walk Around
Visit a family-run coconut candy workshop
Explore more of the Delta from a rowing sampan

data.summary: This 3-day tour package will cover the sacred city of Kandy and the bustling city of Colombo. With numerous historical influences and cultural significance, Kandys focal point is the Temple of Tooth, Dalada Maligawa that preserves the tooth relic of Lord Buddha. Tourists booking this package will also get to visit the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage, which is located in Kegalle.

days.description: Our guide will welcome you at Noi Bai International airport, transfer you to your hotel, visit Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple, Old Quater, and overnight in Hanoi, enjoying street food.

tour_activities.name: Visit the Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple

days.description: We leave Hanoi for Halong Bay, embarking on a boat cruise. Explore caves, grottoes, floating villages, beaches, and grottoes. Enjoy seafood lunch, swimming, and dinner on board. Overnight in Halong Bay, where most islands are abandoned and protected by green foliage.

tour_activities.name: Boat for a Cruise around Halong Bay
Visit the Floating Villages and Beaches on the Bay

days.description: Early morning Tai Chi lesson or breakfast. Boat cruises to port, stopping at Cave of Surprises. Return to Hanoi, flight to Saigon, guide pick-up, hotel check-in, overnight stay. Explore sandy seashores and kayaking.

Breakfast at hotel, transfer to Cu Chi Tunnels, central to war operations like Tet Offensive. Visit man-traps, bomb craters, and remnants. Lunch, drive back to Saigon, overnight. Cu Chi Tunnels are ranked among Southeast Asia's top 7 glamorous terminuses.

Breakfast at hotel, tour guide picks up for Saigon City Tour, visiting Independent Palace, Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office, City Hall, Ben Thanh Market, lunch, shopping, overnight in Saigon.

Depart from Saigon, we drive via Mekong Delta paddle fields. En-route, stop for visit Pineapple Workshop and learn how pineapple products are made here while enjoying sample pineapple jam and candies. Next, stop by or stroll along the way where local family craftsmen workshops make straw bags, boats, incense and mush- rooms You will be welcome by very friendly people and get to explore life as it has traditionally been. Arrive at Thien Ho market and get on boat. Get off bus at this Mekong town market and walk around to take a look at local lifestyle while stretching your body a bit before getting on a boat to tour around the area. While boating, stop by some places to visit a fish farm, a rice process factory and a plantation. Lunch at local house, then drive back to Saigon. En-route, visit Vinh Trang Pagoda, the oldest Buddhist Temple in the Delta featuring a mixture of Chinese, Vietnamese and Cambodian architectural styles. This is the most important venues of Meditation Buddhism Discipline in Mekong Delta. Overnight in Saigon.

tour_activities.name: Drive via Mekong Delta Paddle Fields
Visit the Craftsmen Workshops make Straw Bags, Boats
Visit the Rice process Factory and a Plantation

data.title: Tour Package 07 Days
data.summary: The perfect travel destination, which makes everything seem larger than life, Dubai is a travelers paradise, offering everything that you could hope for and more. Popularly known as a shopping haven, people are stunned by the endless sand dunes, the multicultural cuisine and the innovative ingenuity on offer during their stay. With many claims to world records of gigantic proportions, such as the worlds tallest building, Dubai is a location to be ticked off your bucket list.

days.description: Upon your arrival at the desert splendor of Dubai, you will be welcomed by Olanka representatives and transferred to your hotel in Dubai city. The day is your to spend as you wish, exploring the city, which is well known for its luxury shopping, vibrant nightlife and ultra-modern architecture. With its perfect blend of futuristic visions and profound tradition, Dubai city is a place to explore to your hearts content.

The morning on the second day of this tour can again be spent at leisure as you please. From its culinary landscape to the historic sites such as the Dubai Museum and the Al Fahidi historic district, and the cosmopolitan vibe, you will be treated to myriad of experiences, in the evening where you will be taken on a city tour, giving you a chance to treat yourself to the vivacious atmosphere of Dubai city.

tour_activities.name: Photo-stop at the iconic landmark of Dubai, Burj Al Arab Hotel
The Picturesque Palace and Residential area of Dubai
Visit the Al Bastakiya, the old part of Dubai, Al Fahidi Fort

days.description: Day 03 is all about some Desi style entertainment, as you spend an entire day at the Bollywood Parks. Styled according to the themes of a Bollywood set, these parks are all about providing entertainment in the form of shows and performances, as well as stunts and rides, offering the ultimate Bollywood experience to the entire family. You even get treat yourself to delightful Indian cuisine.

Exploring the city of Dubai is an overwhelming experience, because this is a city with a narrative that brings out the child in you. From the ambitious verve in the form of constructional ingenuity, to the shopping haven that everyone knows the city to be. Your evening can be spent relaxing on a traditional Arabian dhow and enjoying a cruise dinner, with a delicious array of Arabian and International cuisine.

tour_activities.name: Half Day Creek Dhow Cruise Dinner

days.description: Day four is all about fun and excitement, as you spend your entire day at the Wild Wadi water park in Dubai, which is in close proximity to the stunning Burj Al Arab. An outdoor theme park following based on the story of Juha, a character from Arabian folklore, this park offers entertainment for the entire family with more than 30 rides and attractions to entertain yourself with.

You can wallow in the beauty of nature as you tour the incredible Miracle garden in Dubai, a signature creation in the city comprising of an area of 72,000 square meters, filled with 250 million different plants and over 50 million flowers, making it the largest natural flower garden in the world. This extravagant outdoor recreational center is perfect for the nature lover in you.

tour_highlights.tour_highlight_title: Dubai Miracle Garden and Global Village
Emirates A380 in Dubai Miracle Garden

data.title: Holiday Package 04 Days
data.summary: Dubai is a city and emirate in the United Arab Emirates known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture and a lively nightlife scene. Burj Khalifa, an 830m-tall tower, dominates the skyscraper-filled skyline. At its foot lies Dubai Fountain, with jets and lights choreographed to music. On artificial islands just offshore is Atlantis, The Palm, a resort with water and marine-animal parks.

data.title: Holiday Package 6 Days
data.summary: Embark on an island gateway with a 6-Day Sri Lanka tour, a thrilling adventure through a captivating country. Delve into a rich heritage, & uncover coastal gems like Galle. The journey offers encounters with diverse flora & fauna, while the enchanting hill station of Nuwara Eliya beckons for a refreshing retreat. Reveal the heart of the island, the bustling Capital, where adventures await.

data.title: Holiday Package 9 Days
data.summary: Your 9-day Sri Lanka tour package will take you on a rollercoaster of events, from the warmest to the coldest climates, from rural culture to modernity, from ancient history to the 20th century, and from the central hills to the crystal-clear beaches. Leave the hard task of planning to our travel experts & enjoy your Sri Lankan-style cocktail on the golden shore of Bentota Beach with your family!

Head over to Angkor for a tour of unique brick sculptures and temples of Prasat Kravan, Srah Srang and Banteay Kdei. Ta Prohm and Preah Khan are two of the most beautiful temples in the area.

tour_activities.name: Visit to Roluos Group: Lo Lei
Visit to PreahKo and Ba Kong temples

days.description: The ancient capital of Angkor Thom was built during the 12th century and consists of the stunning South Gate with huge statues, the Bayon Temple known for its 54 decorated towers of 200 smiling faces of Avalokitesvara and many others. Explore the ruins of Angkor Wat and its distinct 5 towers which are featured on the Cambodian flag.

tour_activities.name: Visit to Bayon Temple and Angkor Thom
Visit to the Royal Enclosure and Phimeanakas
Visit to the Elephants Terrace cambodia

days.description: Explore Kampong Phluk Village, a floating village on stilts along Tonle Sap Lake, witnessing local life and culture. Depart from the village and transfer to the airport.

tour_activities.name: Boat ride at Tonle Sap Lake
Transfer to Siem Reap airport for flight

tour_inclusions.name: Tours and transfers as per the program
All entrance fees, boat fees, private A/C vehicles with English speaking guide
Cold mineral water during the trips

data.title: Holiday Package 8 Days
data.summary: Our tour experts will help you plan an unforgettable journey around this paradise island in just eight days. Visit the breathtaking archaeological, historical, & cultural sites of this beautiful island. This Sri Lanka tour also includes a visit to Nuwara Eliya, nicknamed "Little England," for its cold, tingly climate. And dont forget to witness Sri Lankas incredible wildlife and pristine beaches!

days.description: The marine culture of Negombo, a beautiful beach town located very close to the airport, is shaped by its colourful culture & the fishery industry. The stunning beach, bustling city life, & lively nightlife welcome its visitors with open hands to enjoy a wonderful time!

tour_activities.name: Go on a boat ride on the Hamilton Canal
Pay a visit to St. Mary's Church
Go on a relaxing beach walk

days.description: Sigiriya is a charming town known for its scenic sunsets, vast paddy fields, and astonishing tourist attractions. In this family trip, you will explore the prestigious history of Anuradhapura, visit the Sigiriya Rock Fortress, and sightsee the mesmerising Sigiriya frescoes and more!

tour_activities.name: Rise to the tunes of the peacocks
Enjoy a chat with the locals
View the village scenery by boat
Cool down with a local beverage

days.description: In Kandy, you will have the privilege of visiting the Temple of the Tooth, one of the most sacred places in the country. The Tooth Relic of Lord Buddha is adorned with gold and jewels in the temple. After the temple visit, explore the incredible flavours of Sri Lankan cuisine!

tour_activities.name: Prepare to witness grandeur of Kandy
Sip on a Lankan brewed cool beer
Stroll down Kandy Lake at dusk
Watch how Ceylon gems are produced

days.description: Nuwara Eliya boasts lush-green estates, soothing weather and enchanting flora and fauna. Will you hike through highlands? Will you enjoy a horseback ride along the bank of Gregory Lake? Or will you explore this British Victorian-style town? Whatever you do, a good time is ensured!

tour_activities.name: Stop by a Ceylon tea Plantation
Enjoy a warm grand dinner buffet
Try a cup of the best  Ceylon tea
Enjoy a ride around Gregory Park
Stop by Kandy Royal Botanical Gardens

days.description: If you are an adventure lover, you are going to love Kitugala. With all the equipment provided, you can explore the jungle, prepare a campsite, and enjoy bird watching. You can also go white-water rafting with your friends & family, and explore ancient caves in the jungle!

tour_activities.name: Experience bird watching in the jungle

days.description: No Sri Lanka trip is complete without a visit to the golden sandy beaches of Bentota. This resort town offers a fun boat ride in the Madu River and a wide array of watersports. Taste toddy, a distinctive local alcoholic beverage and witness the sunset with your loved ones!

tour_activities.name: Wake up in tropical Sri Lanka
Enjoy boat ride along Madu River
Try fish therapy while on boat ride
Take a walk on the golden seashore
Watch sunset with a local Lion beer
Indulge in a seafood dinner buffet
Wind down with Ayurveda spa treatment
Taste spicy crab at seafood BBQ
Join a beach party with locals

days.description: Colombo is a city brimming with endless things to do. Your Sri Lanka trip is sure to be better with Colombo's luxury hotels, and international cuisine including the famous Sri Lankan crab dish. Go on a city tour and experience the island's multi-ethnic heritage and vibrant life!

tour_activities.name: Shop at the One Galle Face mall
Try local delicacies at Galle Face
Speak to local Artists at Green Path
Enjoy tuk tuk ride around city
Unveil at a local Ayurveda spa

Private English Speaking driver for the entire Journey

data.title: Tour Package 3 Days
data.summary: Embark on an exciting 3-day Sri Lanka tour filled with fun & relaxation. Explore the island & witness majestic sanctuaries, historical monuments, & world heritage sites located across the country. Discover vibrant entertainment & cuisine as you taste the diverse flavours of Sri Lanka filled with local spices on this family holiday where every day brings new discoveries & lasting memories.

Immerse yourself in a diverse culinary experience and embark on an exciting tuk-tuk ride around the seaside city. After an exciting day, enjoy the nightlife with friendly locals and good food!

data.title: Holiday Package 05 Days - Ferrari World
data.summary: Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, sits off the mainland on an island in the Persian (Arabian) Gulf. Its focus on oil exports and commerce is reflected by the skylines modern towers and shopping mega centers such as Abu Dhabi and Marina malls. Beneath white-marble domes, the vast Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque features an immense Persian carpet, crystal chandeliers and capacity for 41,000 worshipers.

days.description: Upon your arrival at the desert splendor of Dubai, you will be welcomed by Olanka representatives and transferred to your hotel in Dubai city. After you have the spent the afternoon taking in the sights and smells of Dubai, you will be taken on a cruise on the artificial Dubai water canal, which consist of a relaxing time spent within the luxuries of an enclosed Arabian dhow while being treated to the sublime view of the Dubai skyline.

tour_activities.name: Dubai Water Canal Cruise Including Transfers

days.description: This day is all about the touring the capital city of the United Arab Emirates, Abu Dhabi. The trade hub of the UAE, this city is proudly cosmopolitan and modern in every sense, with its gloriously modern towers and shopping mega centers. You will be treated to blissful seven hour long drive along the Sheikh Zayed road, with panoramic views that are a visual treat.

tour_highlights.tour_highlight_title: Ferrari World Yas Island, Abu Dhabi

days.description: Your entire morning can be spent exploring the cultural dynamism that Dubai has on offer. From its culinary landscape to the historic sites and the cosmopolitan vibe, you will be treated to myriad of experiences. In the evening you will be treated to dinner cruise inside a luxurious yacht, floating along the massive man made Dubai marina, with its impeccable views of the glorious Dubai skyline.

tour_activities.name: Half Day Marina Dhow Cruise Dinner

days.description: Day four is all about fun and excitement, as you spend your entire day at the Wild Wadi water park in Dubai, which is in close proximity to the stunning Burj Al Arab. An outdoor theme park following based on the story of Juha, a character from Arabian folklore, this park offers entertainment for the entire family with more than 30 rides and attractions to entertain yourself with.

tour_highlights.tour_highlight_title: Wadi Water Park and Jumeirah Beach Hotel
